note: Following this publication, several more unau­ thorised editions appeared in France and abroad. Only in 1717, did Fénelon’s great-nephew, Marquis Gabriel-Jacques Fénelon (1688–1746), publish an edition advertised on the title page as the “première édition conforme au manuscrit originale.” This edition became the basis for the future reception of the text. Cahen, Fénelon, pp. LXXXII and CXIV–CXVIII.
